thread.title: Trump Responds to Ruling on Travel Ban: ‘SEE YOU IN COURT’
thread.title_full: Trump Responds to Ruling on Travel Ban: ‘SEE YOU IN COURT’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump Responds to Ruling on Travel Ban: ‘SEE YOU IN COURT’
text:
Trump Responds to Ruling on Travel Ban: ‘SEE YOU IN COURT’ by Josh Feldman | 6:39   
President Trump has tweeted his reaction to the appeals court ruling to uphold the bock on his travel ban. 
And he did it in all-caps: SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 9, 2017 
[ image via Shutterstock ]
